Spinister nodded again. The gun he was holding however latched off, and
transformed into it's nebulan form. "You have not told us what we are
looking for on the planet Havotron," the small creature asked. His arm
cannon also unfolded and transformed. "Who cares, all we gotta do is
kill the planet right?" said the other. Spinister just folded his arms.
